mocafe.angie.af_sourcing

This module contains classes and methods to manage discrete angiogenic factor sources in Mocafe. This discrete agents might represent hypoxic cells inducing angiogenesis, as presented by Travasso et al. [TPoireC+11].

If you use this model in your research, remember to cite the original paper describing the model:

Travasso, R. D. M., Poiré, E. C., Castro, M., Rodrguez-Manzaneque, J. C., & Hernández-Machado, A. (2011). Tumor angiogenesis and vascular patterning: A mathematical model. PLoS ONE, 6(5), e19989. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0019989

For a use example see the Angiogenesis and the Angiogenesis 3D demos.

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.ClockChecker(mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, radius, start_point='east')

Class representing a clock checker, i.e. an object that checks if a given condition is met in the surroundings of a point of the mesh.

clock_check(point, function: dolfin.function.function.Function, threshold, condition)

clock-check the given function in the surrounding of the given point

Parameters

  • point – center of the clock-check

  • function – function to check

  • threshold – threshold that the function has to surpass

  • condition – lambda function representing the condition to be met

Returns

True if the condition is met; False otherwise

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.ConstantSourcesField(source_map: mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourceMap, parameters: mocafe.fenut.parameters.Parameters)

FEniCS Expression representing the distribution of the angiogenic factor expressed by the source cells.

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.RandomSourceMap(mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, n_sources: int, parameters: dolfin.cpp.parameter.Parameters, where: Optional[function] = None)

A SourceMap of randomly distributed sources in a given spatial domain

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourceCell(point: numpy.ndarray, creation_step)

Class representing a source cell, i.e. a cell of the non-vascular tissue which expresses an angiogenic factor. It is just a wrapper of BaseCell.

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourceMap(mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, source_points: list, parameters: mocafe.fenut.parameters.Parameters)

Class representing the spatial map of the source cell positions. This class is responsible for keeping the position of each source cell at any point of the simulation, providing access to it to other objects and methods.

get_global_source_cells()

Get the global list of source cell (equal for each MPI process)

Returns

the global list of source cells

get_local_source_cells()

Get the local list of source cells (for the current MPI process)

Returns

remove_global_source(source_cell: mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourceCell)

Remove a source cell from the global source cell list. If the cell is part of the local source cells, it is removed also from that list.

Parameters

source_cell – the source cell to remove

Returns

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourcesManager(source_map: mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.SourceMap, mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, parameters: mocafe.fenut.parameters.Parameters)

Class representing the manager of the position of the source cells. This class takes care of removing the source cells when they are near the blood vessels and of translating the source cell map in a FEniCS phase field function

apply_sources(af: dolfin.function.function.Function)

Apply the sources at the current time to the angiogenic factor field af, respecting the expression function.

Parameters

af – FEniCS function representing the angiogenic factor

Returns

nothing

remove_sources_near_vessels(c: dolfin.function.function.Function, **kwargs)

Removes the source cells near the blood vessels

Parameters

c – blood vessel field

Returns

mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.sources_in_circle_points(center: numpy.ndarray, circle_radius, cell_radius)

Generate the points where to place the source cells to place the source cells in a circle. The circle is full of source cells.

Parameters

  • center – center of the circle

  • circle_radius – radius of the circle

  • cell_radius – radius of the cells

Returns

the list of source cells positions
